games.tictactoe
Class TicTacToe

java.lang.Object
  games.tictactoe.TicTacToe
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class TicTacToe
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

TicTacToe is a the main game engine class.

  • All logical operations are collected here
  • Calling any of class constructors will automatically start a new game.

    • See Also:
    Tile, Player, GameError, UIPrompt, Serialized Form

    public TicTacToe(Player player1,

    The main class constructor Performs actions:
    • Assigns instance variables
    • Creates grid

    Parameters:
    player1 - First Player
    player2 - Second Player
    width - Game width in units
    height - Game height in units

    player2 -
    Method Detail

    move

    public boolean move(java.lang.String y,
                    java.lang.String x)
    Converts string coordinates into real array coordinates. Searches in HashMap for the real values. If real values are found, calls basic move() function.

    Parameters:
    y - Row on the field (as letter)
    x - Column on the field (as number)
    Returns:
    True on success and false on failure

    move

    public boolean move(int y,
                    int x)
    Performs a move by current player.
    • Checks if the game is over
    • Checks if the on grid is free
    • Changes sign of a grid for current player's sign
    • Checks for the win
    On success switches player and changes type of the tile. Sets lastError on failure.

    Parameters:
    y - Row on the field
    x - Column on the field
    Returns:
    True on success and false on failure
    See Also:
    GameError

    getLastError

    public java.lang.Integer getLastError()
    Returns last error set by a public function.

    Returns:
    Integer that corresponds to an error.
    See Also:
    GameError

    getWinner

    public Player getWinner()
    Returns instance of Player that won the game. If the game is not finished or is drawn, returns null.

    Returns:
    Winner player

    loadTest

    public void loadTest()
    Loads grid with 4 winning situations
